alert.note: Alert for Lamoille (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 3:54AM EST until January 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Lamoille County. * WHEN...From 7 PM Sunday to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to develop Sunday evening. Some periods of heavy snow are possible during the early morning hours Monday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
